description: This file sets up a knowledge base and an agent for web crawling and question answering, using specific classes and modules related to firecrawl, vector database, and agent management.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of interacting with a knowledge base and performing search and response tasks.

classes.name: FireCrawlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that uses firecrawl to gather and manage web content.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and retrieving vector representations of content.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, with optional markdown formatting.
